metadata.title: Metadata
metadata.description: The metadata object for the data collection

object_collections.title: Object_Collections
object_collections.description: A collection of different data objects like data cubes and feature collections

geometry_collection.title: Geometry_Collection
geometry_collection.description: A list of WKT geometry strings that are referenced by the objects in the object collection.

timestamps.title: Timestamps
timestamps.description: The time stamps of the data collection, that can be references by each object (feature, cube, ...).

Metadata.title: Metadata
Metadata.description: Metadata description of the topological data collection

name.title: Name
name.description: The name of topological data collection. Allowed characters [a-z][A-Z][0-9][_].

description.title: Description
description.description: Description of the topological data collection.

number_of_object_collections.title: Number_Of_Object_Collections
number_of_object_collections.description: Number of all collections (data cubes, image collection, simple feature collections,topological feature collections).

source.title: Source
source.description: The source of the data collections.

link.title: Link
link.description: URL link to a specific web source.

Dimension.title: Dimension
Dimension.description: Description of a data cube dimension. See the STAC dimension definition for more details and examples.

type.title: Type
type.description: The type of the dimension (spatial, temporal, bands, other)

unit.title: Unit
unit.description: The unit of the dimension in SI units or UDUNITS. Time instances or intervals are defined as ISO8601 strings

extent.title: Extent
extent.description: The spatial or temporal extent of the dimension. It must be a tuple of values.

values.title: Values
values.description: A list of coordinates for this dimension. Use ISO8601 to specify time instances and intervals.If spatial axis are irregular, then the values parameter should be used to specify this axis. Otherwise the extent and the number of cells is sufficient.

number_of_cells.title: Number_Of_Cells
number_of_cells.description: The number of cells in the spatial dimension or intervals / time instances in case of temporal dimension.

axis.title: Axis
axis.description: If the dimension is spatial, then the axis x, y or z can be specified with this parameter.

reference_system.title: Reference_System
reference_system.description: The definition of the coordinate system. If an integer was provided, it will be interpreted as EPSG code. If a string was provided it will be interpreted as WKT2 definition or in case of a temporal dimension as the calendar. In case of a dictionary object PROJSON is expected.

DataCube.title: DataCube
DataCube.description: A multidimensional representation of a data cube

name.title: Name
name.description: The unique name of the data cube. Allowed characters [a-z][A-Z][0-9][_].

dim.title: Dim
dim.description: A an ordered list of dimension names of the data cube. The dimensions are applied in the provided order.

size.title: Size
size.description: The size of the dimensions as an ordered list of integer values.

dimensions.title: Dimensions
dimensions.description: A dictionary of dimension descriptions. Dimensions are references by their name that is the key of the dict. The id of the dimension is a string, that should follow the convention: t -> time, x, y, z -> spatial dimensions.

field_collection.title: Field_Collection
field_collection.description: The integer index of the field collection. All fields and their values of this indexed collection are assigned to the data cube and must have the same size

timestamp.title: Timestamp
timestamp.description: The integer index of the assigned timestamp from the timestamp array

min_x.title: Min_X
min_x.description: The minimum x coordinate of the 3d bounding box.

max_x.title: Max_X
max_x.description: The maximum x coordinate of the 3d bounding box.

min_y.title: Min_Y
min_y.description: The minimum y coordinate of the 3d bounding box.

max_y.title: Max_Y
max_y.description: The maximum y coordinate of the 3d bounding box.

min_z.title: Min_Z
min_z.description: The minimum z coordinate of the 3d bounding box.

max_z.title: Max_Z
max_z.description: The maximum z coordinate of the 3d bounding box.

SimpleFeature.title: SimpleFeature
SimpleFeature.description: A simple feature definition that may contain (multi)points, (multi)lines or (multi)polygons

type.title: Type
type.description: The type of the simple feature: Point, LineString, Polygon, MultiPoint, MultiLine, MultiPolygon.

predecessors.title: Predecessors
predecessors.description: A list of predecessors from which this feature was created.

geometry.title: Geometry
geometry.description: The index of a geometry from the geometry collection.

variable.title: Variable
variable.description: The index of the assigned field collection and the value/label index.

timestamp.title: Timestamp
timestamp.description: The index of the assigned timestamp.

name.title: Name
name.description: The unique name of the simple feature collection. Allowed characters [a-z][A-Z][0-9][_].

bbox.title: Bbox
bbox.description: The bounding box of all features.

reference_system.title: Reference_System
reference_system.description: The definition of the spatial reference system. If an integer was provided it will be interpreted as EPSG code. If a string was provided it will be interpreted as WKT2 definition. In case of a dictionary object, PROJSON is expected. The definition is identical to the dimension srs

ObjectCollection.title: ObjectCollection
ObjectCollection.description: Object collection that contains data cubes and simple feature collections

simple_feature_collections.title: Simple_Feature_Collections
simple_feature_collections.description: A list of simple features collections

Variable.title: Variable
Variable.description: This represents a variable definition with values and labels

values.title: Values
values.description: The variable values that must be numeric.

VariablesCollection.title: VariablesCollection
VariablesCollection.description: A collection of variables that all have the same size

size.title: Size
size.description: The size of the variables collection. Each variable of this collection must have the same size. The size of the variable can be mutli-dimensional. However, variables are stored as one dimensional arrays and must be re-shaped in the multi-dimensional form for processing.

number_of_variables.title: Number_Of_Variables
number_of_variables.description: The number of variables in this collection.

variables.title: Variables
variables.description: A list of variables with the same size.

TimeStamps.title: TimeStamps
TimeStamps.description: The time stamps of the data collections

intervals.title: Intervals
intervals.description: A list of timestamp tuples as strings. Here start and end time can be specified. If only the start time is given, then the end time can be None.

calendar.title: Calendar
calendar.description: The definition of the temporal reference system of the  time stamps. Either the gregorian or julian calendar.
